article.author: Royal Caribbean
article.title: 11 Must Do’s for your visit to Perfect Day at CocoCay
article.lead: Here are 11 must do's for any visit to Perfect Day at CocoCay, Royal Caribbean's new private island in the Bahamas that's unlike any you've ever been before.
